action.text: SA 6032 fell when SA 6031 was withdrawn.
Amendment SA 6032 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 6031 (the instructions of the motion to commit). (consideration: CR S5148; text: CR S5148) To modify the effective date.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6032 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 6031 (the instructions of the motion to commit).
